metadata.Title: CVE-2018-7651 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - low.
metadata.Description: index.js in the ssri module before 5.2.2 for Node.js is prone to a regular expression denial of service vulnerability in strict mode functionality via a long base64 hash string.

criterions.comment: node-ssri: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
